eczema.demoDescription: A chronic skin condition causing inflammation and itching. (This is demo data - will be replaced by RAG responses)

psoriasis.demoDescription: An autoimmune condition causing rapid skin cell buildup and scaling. (Demo data)

acne.demoDescription: Common skin condition caused by clogged hair follicles. (Demo data)

dermatitis.demoDescription: Skin rash caused by contact with an irritant or allergen. (Demo data)

rosacea.demoDescription: Chronic inflammatory condition causing facial redness. (Demo data)

melanoma.demoDescription: URGENT: Possible serious skin cancer. Requires immediate medical evaluation. (Demo data)

fungal_infection.demoDescription: Contagious fungal infection affecting the skin. (Demo data)

unknown.demoDescription: Unable to identify condition. Please consult a healthcare professional. (Demo data)
